resources.string: \tTo become a broadcaster, visit: dwarfee.com/becomebroadcaster (from PC or Mac) and fill necessary data like broadcaster name, description and avatar. \n\n\tBroadcaster Account is free up to 50 active subscribers after that you will be charged 1$ per month for ability to sends push notifications to your subscribers.
\tYou can check events schedule and much more using calendar. Calendar will be available in next major release.
